subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Schools' march toward diversity spans generations

06/29/07 12:54 PM, EDT
In the first three decades after the Supreme Court said it was unconstitutional for black and white children to attend separate public schools, children of different races and background were moved onto the same campuses and shared classrooms, learning side by side and from one another.
FULL STORY
